meanings.sent1: The argosy sailed across the vast ocean.
meanings.sent2: The argosy transported goods from one port to another.
meanings.sent3: The argosy's crew had a feast after a successful voyage.
meanings.sent4: The argosy cut through the waves like a knife through butter.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the majestic argosy on the horizon was breathtaking.

meanings.sent1: The library was an argosy of knowledge and wisdom.
meanings.sent2: Her mind was an argosy of creative ideas.
meanings.sent3: The treasure chest was an argosy of sparkling jewels.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was an argosy of joy in the room.
meanings.sent5: The garden was an argosy of colorful flowers and scents.
